medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of abdominal pain predominantly in the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began acutely; initially associated with bloating, which progressed to nausea and vomiting over two episodes overnight. The patient also reported experiencing chills in the emergency department. This was the first occurrence of such symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: None specified except for history of circumcision.
